justification: "IU was assessed using the German version (Gerlach et al., 2008) of the Intolerance of Uncertainty Scale (Freeston et al., 1994)."
"Trait indecisiveness was measured using the 11-item version (Rassin et al., 2007) of the Indecisiveness Scale (Frost & Shows, 1993)."
"To assess whether participants rated the presented behavior as a maladaptive safety behavior, eight items were developed... Items were averaged to form a single score."
"They indicated decision importance (e.g., 'The decision has important consequences' … α2a = .77; α2b = .81). Importance ratings were averaged and served as manipulation check."
